document_data.name: Greater Malison
document_data.mainbody: '''''Greater malison''''' was an uncommon [[enchantment]] [[spell]] that caused a group of creatures to become cursed for a limited time, making them more likely to fail in areas they usually would not.
document_data.Effects: The spell affected all hostiles within a sphere of a 30 ft (9.1 m) radius, adversely affecting their chance to succeed in all skills. Alternatively, the caster could make the targets more susceptible to spells from a certain [[Magic|school of magic]]. ''Greater malison'' had a range of 60 ft (18.3 m), and the duration of the curse scaled with the ability of the [[wizard]].
document_data.Components: Only a verbal component was required to cast the spell.
